sourcesContent:
/**
 * MAIN.JS - Application Entry Point
 * 
 * This is where the Vue app starts. It:
 * 1. Sets up all plugins (Bootstrap, Vuelidate for form validation)
 * 2. Connects the router (page navigation) and store (state management)
 * 3. Mounts the app to the HTML element
 */

import Vue from 'vue'
import App from './App.vue'
import router from './router'
import store from './store'
import Vuelidate from 'vuelidate'
import { BootstrapVue, IconsPlugin } from 'bootstrap-vue'

// Import CSS files for styling
import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'
import 'bootstrap-vue/dist/bootstrap-vue.css'
import './assets/claymorphism.css'

// Install plugins
Vue.use(BootstrapVue)    // UI components (buttons, cards, etc)
Vue.use(IconsPlugin)     // Icons for UI
Vue.use(Vuelidate)       // Form validation

Vue.config.productionTip = false

/**
 * Create the Vue app with:
 * - router: Handle page navigation
 * - store: Manage app state (auth, projects, tasks)
 * - render: Display App.vue as the root component
 */
new Vue({
  router,
  store,
  render: h => h(App),
}).$mount('#app')
